text: A special squad of the Agri Business and Commercial Tax unit seized 1,000 bags of paddy procured by some brokers for onward sale to a private rice mill at Kallakurichi on Friday. According to official sources of the Agri Business and Agri Commercial Tax unit, the brokers had purchased the paddy from a group of farmers in Avudaiyarkovil and were moving it by five trucks, without remitting the commercial tax.
title: 1,000 bags of paddy seized
